message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $125. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a good deal. I'm willing to make one more compromise and sell it to you for $132. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise again, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $133. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $129 and $133, so I'll sell it to you for $131. What do you think?
